attributes.action: Keep Rough Close Post Office where it is
attributes.additional_details:
Post Office Ltd plan to relocate Rough Close Post Office from its current relocation of 4 Grindley Lane, Meir Heath, Stoke On Trent ST3 7LW to Martins McColls Newsagents, 424 Sandon Road, Meir Heath, Stoke on Trent. ST3 7LH and convert it to a Local Open Plan style branch.
We demand that the government intervene and stop Post Office Ltd going ahead with this planned relocation.
